subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh scored all 24 of his points in the second half last night and added 11 rebounds to help the Toronto Raptors defeat the injury-depleted Charlotte Bobcats, 93-76.
snippet: Chris Bosh scored all 24 of his points in the second half last night and added 11 rebounds to help the Toronto Raptors defeat the injury-depleted Charlotte Bobcats, 93-76.
